honest network

sim2 --nodes 1000 --jobs 15000

1000	15000	32945   2.1963

100 	1500 	3256 	2.17067
100 	1500 	3245 	2.164
100 	1500 	3227	2.15133


20 		300 	705		2.35
20 		300 	632		2.10667
20 		300 	640		2.13333
20 		300 	679		2.26333
20 		300 	637		2.12333


10 		150 	315		2.1
10 		150 	378		2.52
10 		150 	352		2.34
10 		150 	359		2.39333
10 		150 	350		2.33333
10 		150 	350		2.33333
10 		150 	347		2.31333
10 		150 	317		2.11333





dishonest network (20% of the nodes send back wrong results 50% of the time)

sim2 --nodes 1000 --jobs 15000 --false 0.5 --dishonest 0.2 --srand 111

1000 	15000 	38303 	2.55353

100 	1500 	3682 	2.45467
100 	1500 	3555 	2.37
100 	1500 	3562 	2.37467
100 	1500 	4352 	2.90133
100 	1500 	4406 	2.93733
100 	1500 	3737 	2.49133


20 		300 	683		2.27667
20 		300 	721		2.40333
20 		300 	817		2.73333
20 		300 	734		2.44667
20 		300 	534		2.71333
